sentence.Network_en: Very likely he'd told them he had American business interests.
sentence.Network_cn: 很可能他已经告诉他们自己拥有美国商业利益.

sentence.Network_en: Early American weathervanes were most often cut from flat wooden boards.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国早期的风向标大多截自平直的木板。

sentence.Network_en: She has had many credits and name-checks in American Vogue.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国版《时尚》多次对她进行赞扬或是提到她的名字。

entry.def: An American person or thing belongs to or comes from the United States of America.

example.ex: ...the American Ambassador at the United Nations.
...the influence of American television and movies.
example.tran: 美国电视和电影产生的影响

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of the United States
2. the English language as used in the United States
3. a native or inhabitant of a North American or Central American or South American country
1. of or relating to the United States of America or its people or language or culture;
2. of or relating to or characteristic of the continents and islands of the Americas;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词和形容词,"……地方,……人或动物等"; 2. ……的

stems_affixes.word_buile: Americ美国,美洲+an……地方,……人或动物等→adj.美洲的 n.美国人
republic共和国+an……地方,……人或动物等→adj.共和的
Rom+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.古罗马人 adj.罗马的
ruffi=brutal残忍的,兽性的+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.恶棍,歹徒 adj.残暴的
sub下面+urban城市的→城市下面→城市之外的→郊区的
urb城市+an表示地方→adj.城市的,市内的
veter+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.老兵,老手;老兵的; adj.经验丰富的
Americ美国,美洲+an……地方,……人或动物等→adj.美洲的 n.美国人
amphi两个,两种+bi生命+an……地方,……人或动物等→两个生命→两栖动物
parti=party党,一部分人+s+an人→党人→党徒

ruffi=brutal残忍的,兽性的+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.恶棍,歹徒 adj.残暴的
Spart斯巴达+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.斯巴达人
veter+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.老兵,老手;老兵的; adj.经验丰富的

sentences.en: When I heard him speaking such broken English, I knew he was not a native American.
sentences.cn: 我一听他讲那种蹩脚英语, 我就知道他不是一个土生土长的美国人。

sentences.en: Many young men like to speak American English.
sentences.cn: 许多年轻人喜欢讲美国英语。

sentences.en: For me, baseball is as American as apple pie.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，棒球同苹果馅饼一样是地道的美国玩意儿。
